ministry.name: Sound Team
ministry.overview: The Sound Team assists the pastor and worship team by providing audio technical support for all worship services, as well as worship team rehearsals and soundchecks.

long-description.heading: About
long-description.p: We plug in cords, turn knobs, etc., make worship band sound really good!! :-)
long-description.heading: Want to help?
long-description.p: If you have an interest in helping with sound then this is the team for you!
